column5: Just wondering if anybody knows any good shore fishing spots near Wawa. Have a friend working there this week and he asked me but I have no clue about the area. Any info would be appreciated. Thanks, Simon.

Hey simon, not sure what kind of fishing he is into but the michipicoten river and others will have steelhead and late salmon in it for sure...The guy to look up is James Smedley. He is a great guy and will have quality information
